name: Project Z (PhoBowl)
description:
You are a US Soldier who recently returned from overseas.  Adrenaline rushes in as you soon realize the city has been overrun by the undead. 

Shoot zombies with the ability to arm yourself in an arsenal! 

Key Features (Some to be added shortly)

  • Variety of weapons
  • Collective Upgrades
  • Diverse selection of maps
